SEARCH
Package com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.containers

Class ContentZoomPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.containers.ContentZoomPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
@Deprecated public class ContentZoomPane extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
Deprecated.
This class will be removed in the final stable 2.0.0 version in favor of ContentZoomScrollPane.
This class provides zooming and panning for any JavaFX Node.
Reacts to mouse scrolls and right-click mouse dragging (panning).
The content node is out forward in the z-index, so it can react to mouse events first. The node should consume any event not meant to propagate to this pane.
Author:
brunomnsilva
